text:
Staff #vaccinations for 1st dose 83% in Lancashire and 58% for second dose (presuming that will be increasing as their dates come round)

So why do we need to mandate it? 

#vaccine #COVID19 @donnapierpoint @LancashireCC @_mark_topps @BunterDawn @DHSCgovuk @GOVUK @MattHancock https://t.co/BxVowY1sQB
